answers.author: Robert McLeod
answers.text:
Which aspect of the process are you interested in outsourcing?
1.  Assessment of property values & handling the review with property owners.  
2. Mailing of the tax bills.
3.  Receiving payments to a post office box, processing and depositing payments.  
4.  Are you limited to only working with companies in Georgia?
5.  Have you considered contracting with the County for services?
Robert S. McLeod, ICMA-CM

text: I am interested in possibly outsourcing the City's Municipal Property Taxes as a cost savings. Is anyone familiar with companies in Georgia who do this type work? Thanks.
title: Out Sourcing Municipal Property Taxes
